title: Broccoli schema definition
description: This document describes the possible ways to interact with the broccoli Job Executor system

task.title: Describes a Strict Task
task.description: A Strict Task is a simple process holding a name, a command and following Sub Tasks. Sub Tasks can be Strict or Polymorphic

command.title: Command
command.description: The full command to execute including args

wait.title: Wait for other Tasks, at same level, to complete
wait.description: Set it to true if this Task should wait for others to complete before moving on

guidance.title: Guidance Tasks
guidance.description: Guidance defines the Sub Tasks to execute after the current Task finishes

polymorphicTask.title: Describes a Polymorphic Task
